actions.name: AssociatePatchToManifestJob
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a patch file with the manifest file to update the manifest file

actions.name: DescribeConsoleJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get status of GroundTruthLabeling Jobs

actions.name: ListDatasetObjects
actions.description: Grants permission to list dataset objects in a manifest file

actions.name: RunFilterOrSampleDatasetJob
actions.description: Grants permission to filter records from a manifest file using S3 select. Get sample entries based on random sampling

actions.name: RunGenerateManifestByCrawlingJob
actions.description: Grants permission to list a S3 prefix and create manifest files from objects in that location
